text:
I always loved the n64 rainbow road music, but hated the track. So boring. Sorry n64 fans. Mario kart 7, awesome track and music = best track ever.

text:
@228SomeGuy yeah, the gamecube was great, and for me, pokemon games get boring after a while, because it's always catch>train>battle gym/event>win>complete pokedex. thats my oppinion, idk...
but, I think I finally know why the old games where better, it's because they were just trying. they did'nt know what a "good game" really was, and they wanted to make quality over profit. thats what I think the games of today are lacking.....

text: I haven't had the chance to play this game yet, but I really like this rendition of Rainbow Road. Since we all know there will be a Mario Kart on the WiiU at some point, I have to say there could  be some awesomely fun possibilities with the tablet. I can see the one holding the tablet throwing obstacles while the other players race, maybe take the role of a flying lakitu !
